content.title: AICTE-ISTE INDUCTION/REFRESHER PROGRAMME SCHEME
content.details: AICTE-ISTE Induction/ Refresher Programme has been launched by the All India Council for Technical Education with an intention to provide financial assistance to AICTE approved institutions/universities in conducting training for the teaching faculties working in technical institutions.
eligibility: AICTE approved institutions/University departments imparting technical education.
Coordinator must be a full time regular faculty with adequate experience in teaching and research with publications.
Maximum 2 proposals per institute would be considered in a year.
Preferably one self-financing program should have been arranged in last 12 months by the college.
ISTE will charge ₹1,500/- per proposal as processing fee.
documents_required: Offer letter of ISTE for conduct of the Programme
An acceptance letter by the institute in response to the offer letter
List of resource persons invited with full address, contact details, topics etc.
List of participants attended the Programme
Copy of question paper and participant's performance for the test conducted.
Minimum five photographs and Pen drive/CD of selected sessions.
Feedback of the participants with signatures
Photographs of the conducted event (05 Nos)
Supporting bills/documents and paid vouchers on account of expenses incurred for the purpose.
Two hard copies of proceedings in bound form
The above documents should be counter signed by the Coordinator.
A copy of result of the test conducted

faqs.question: What is AICTE-ISTE Induction/Refresher Program scheme?
faqs.answer: AICTE-ISTE Induction/ Refresher Program provide financial assistance to the institutions/universites for conducting training to teaching faculties working in technical institutions.

faqs.question: Who manages this scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by AICTE and ISTE.

faqs.question: Mention one of the main benefits of the scheme.
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the technical university for the training program.

faqs.question: What should be the criteria of the institution?
Is there any charges for the proposal?
faqs.answer: ISTE will charge ₹ 1500/- per proposal as processing fee. The proposals will be accepted only if institute pays the processing fee through RTGS/NEFT.

faqs.question: Maximum how many proposals per institute would be considered in a year?
faqs.answer: Maximum 2 proposals per institute would be considered in a year.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the Program?
faqs.answer: The duration of the Programme shall be one week (six working days).

faqs.question: Which types of training will be conducted?
faqs.answer: Two types: Induction Training and Refresher Training.
